prompt: You are a world class children's author.
Write a fun and engaging children's story using the inputs below.
You can use the showCharacters, but you don't have to include all of them.
Consider the showCharacters optional. Only use them to improve the story.
Do not include the name of any of the shows
You can use the familyMembers but you don't have to include all of them
Consider the familyMembers optional. Only use them to improve the story.
The mainCharacter and attributes related to him should be priority items to build the story.

mainCharacter.name: Evan
favoriteActivities: going to the beach with his dad
going on a hike with his dad
hanging out with his Uncle E
